exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DescSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1024" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x000000" fillAlpha="0.68"/>
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" y="0" width="640" height="1024" x="0">
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" y="90" x="45"/>
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" y="90" scaleX="-1" x="591"/>
		<e:Image source="text_hyzc_png" y="110" x="243" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image source="imgdescbg2_png" x="92" y="136" scale9Grid="197,79,83,27" height="650"/>
		<e:Button id="enterBtn" anchorOffsetX="102" x="316" y="770" anchorOffsetY="33">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_enter_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Scroller id="scroller" width="430" height="520" x="105" y="194">
			<e:Group>
				<e:Image source="text_desc_png" x="0" y="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Button y="155" id="closeBtn" anchorOffsetX="102" anchorOffsetY="33" x="530">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_close1_png" source.down="btn_close2_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FriendHelpSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect fillColor="0x000000" y="0" fillAlpha="0.68" width="640" height="1024" x="0"/>
	<e:Group y="0" id="mainGroup" width="640" height="1024" x="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_zhuli_png" y="121" x="87"/>
		<e:Image y="147" x="231" source="img_hyzl_png"/>
		<e:Button id="zhuliBtn" y="596" x="342" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_gtzl_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="startBtn" y="727" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_wyyy_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="img_tx_png" x="180" y="227"/>
		<e:Image id="txImg" y="249" x="206" width="120" height="120"/>
		<e:Image source="text_hyzl_png" x="214" y="284"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel" x="391" y="283" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="125" height="22" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FrientdHelpSuccessSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="640" fillAlpha="0.68" height="1024" x="0"/>
	<e:Group y="0" id="mainGroup" width="640" height="1024" x="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_zhuli_png" y="121" x="87"/>
		<e:Image y="147" x="231" source="text_zlcg2_png"/>
		<e:Button id="shareBtn" anchorOffsetY="41" y="601" anchorOffsetX="120" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_fxhy_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="startBtn" anchorOffsetY="41" y="733" anchorOffsetX="120" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_msqw_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel" y="288" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="125" height="22" x="303" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Image x="186" y="283" source="text_zlcg_png"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" fillAlpha="0.68" width="640" height="1024" fillColor="0x000000" x="0"/>
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" height="1024" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_zhuli_png" y="121" x="87"/>
		<e:Image source="text_yxjs_png" y="147" x="231"/>
		<e:Image source="text_jswz_png" y="287" x="202"/>
		<e:Button id="restartBtn" y="654" x="342" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_zctz_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="friendBtn" y="548" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_yqhy_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="guanzhuBtn" y="758" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_gzwm_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="homeBtn" y="867" anchorOffsetX="120" anchorOffsetY="41" x="342">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_fhsy_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLabel" x="414" y="301" font="font_red_fnt" text="0"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="rankLabel" y="362" text="0" x="410" font="font_green_fnt"/>
		<e:Image source="img_xngf_png" x="200" y="403" width="314" height="35"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" fillAlpha="0.68" width="640" height="1024" fillColor="0x000000" x="0"/>
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" height="1024" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="background" x="0" y="0" width="640" height="1024" source="bg_jpg"/>
		<e:Image source="img_fd_png" top="24" left="22"/>
		<e:Image source="gift_png" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5" top="38" left="3"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLabel" text="x0" font="font_fnt" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5" x="163" y="138" width="250"/>
		<e:Image x="254" top="25" source="nei_logo_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="giftImg" source="gift_png" x="444" y="454" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="tipsImage" source="screentips_png" x="184" y="822"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GiftLayerSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" fillAlpha="0.68" width="640" height="1024" fillColor="0x000000" x="0"/>
	<e:Group y="0" id="mainGroup" width="640" height="1024" x="0">
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" y="90" x="45"/>
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" y="90" scaleX="-1" x="591"/>
		<e:Button id="enterBtn" y="775" anchorOffsetX="102" anchorOffsetY="33" x="320">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_yhzc_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image y="110" x="243" source="text_jpcx_png"/>
		<e:Image source="img_bg2_png" y="184" width="380" height="202" scale9Grid="34,15,5,8" x="130"/>
		<e:Image source="img_zs_png" x="507" y="235"/>
		<e:Image source="img_zs_png" y="336" x="133" scaleX="-1" scaleY="-1"/>
		<e:Image source="img_zs2_png" x="486" y="187"/>
		<e:Image source="img_zs2_png" y="384" x="153" scaleX="-1" scaleY="-1"/>
		<e:Image source="img_tx_png" x="133" y="184"/>
		<e:Image id="touxiangImg" height="120" width="120" x="160" y="206"/>
		<e:Image source="text_input_png" x="307" y="195"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel" x="358" y="193" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="130" height="22"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLabel" x="360" y="237" font="font_red_fnt" width="128" text="0"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="zhuliLabel" y="277" font="font_red_fnt" x="360" width="128" text="0"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="rankLabel" y="315" x="360" width="128" font="font_red_fnt" text="0"/>
		<e:Image source="img_hjjl_png" y="403" x="109"/>
		<e:Label id="record1" x="114" y="449" height="22" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="410"/>
		<e:Label id="record2" y="483" height="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="113" width="410" size="22"/>
		<e:Label id="record3" y="520" size="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="413" height="22" x="114"/>
		<e:Label id="record4" y="551" height="22" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="113" width="383" size="22"/>
		<e:Image source="text_cxwz_png" y="584" x="103"/>
		<e:Image source="text_cxzy_png" y="709" x="182"/>
		<e:Button id="closeBtn" y="156" anchorOffsetX="102" anchorOffsetY="33" x="530">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_close1_png" source.down="btn_close2_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="buttons.MusicButtonSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="290" height.up="287">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="music2_png" source.up="music2_png" source.down="music2_png" source.disabled="music2_png" source.upAndSelected="music1_png" source.downAndSelected="music1_png" source.disabledAndSelected="music1_png"/>
	<e:Image includeIn="up" x="0" y="0" source="music2_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="mainbg_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="startBtn" y="688" x="340" source="uires_2_png" anchorOffsetX="233" anchorOffsetY="233"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="musicBtn" label="切换按钮" skinName="buttons.MusicButtonSkin" top="-61" x="427"/>
	<e:Image source="img_logl_png" bottom="78" x="254"/>
	<e:Button id="rankBtn" anchorOffsetX="154" anchorOffsetY="152" height="304" x="79" bottom="-152">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_phb_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="descBtn" anchorOffsetX="154" anchorOffsetY="152" x="576" bottom="-152">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_desc_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="img_main_png" x="200" bottom="46"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PlayerInfoSceneSkin" width="640" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect y="0" height="1024" fillColor="0x000000" width="640" fillAlpha="0.68" x="0"/>
	<e:Group id="mainGroup" height="1024" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" y="90" x="45"/>
		<e:Image source="img_bg_png" x="591" scaleX="-1" y="90"/>
		<e:Image source="text_input1_png" y="282" x="110"/>
		<e:Image source="text_input1_png" y="433" x="110"/>
		<e:Image source="img_name_png" x="111" y="257"/>
		<e:Image source="img_phone_png" x="111" y="410"/>
		<e:Label text="姓名:" x="136" y="310" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="24"/>
		<e:Label y="465" text="电话:" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="136" size="24"/>
		<e:Image source="text_cxzy_png" y="638" x="182"/>
		<e:Image source="text_zcwz_png" y="564" x="104"/>
		<e:Button id="enterBtn" y="727" x="320" anchorOffsetX="102" anchorOffsetY="33">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_enter_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText y="310" height="24" id="nameInputText" width="284" size="24" x="220" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="left"/>
		<e:EditableText y="465" height="24" id="phoneInputText" width="284" size="24" x="220" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
		<e:Image source="text_hyzc_png" x="243" y="110"/>
		<e:Button y="164" id="closeBtn" anchorOffsetX="102" anchorOffsetY="33" x="528">
			<e:skinName>
